about_the_game:
I am a Solo Developer from Germany and this is my first game.
Together with the tiny team behind Bagpack Games we created this first glimps at what we plan to develop further into a full-fledged experience later!

We hope you enjoy it!

The Sanatorium


Explore the environment of the Sanatorium and try to stay calm despite the Horrors that might be hidden in the shadows around every corner. Thread carefully as tragic ends await uncareful visitors in this house!

Escape

When waking up, one thing is clear: You need to escape! Make your way through the rooms of the Sanatorium, equipped with nothing but the clothes you wear. Pay close attention to your surroundings and you might find some tools that can help you on your journey. 
Don't give up and ultimately find your way out of this horrific place!

Solve Puzzles

Sometimes the path might not be clear from the start. Pay close attention to your environment and solve thrilling puzzles to delve deeper into the darkest corners of the Sanatorium.

content_descriptors.notes: Its more of an atmospheric soft horror where the Player walks through dark corridors. There is no gore or explicit violence involved.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: coming later
  • Additional Notes: To run at low
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: coming later
  • Additional Notes: To run at high

short_description: The Patient is a classic escape game in ego perspective where you find yourself in a Sanatorium in the 1930s. Explore the mysterious location and solve cunning Puzzles to progress further. But stay alert, you are not alone! Will you be able to find your way out?
